name: Google Plus - EyeFriendly
description:
Completely new Google+ design created.
This style will hide unwonted elements but if your missing something just edit style and remove related part.
obsoletion_message: Google+ is dying with closing Google Reader.
additional_info:
20/05/2013 Completely new Google+ design created.
- This style will hide unwonted elements but if your missing something just edit style and remove related part.
09/03/2013 Fix position of the top flying panel
15/02/2013 Added option for face detection on the pictures

27/06/2012 Added option for font size and chat.
26/06/2012 Updated for design changes.
10/05/2012 Updated for new design.
